name: Full Void
description:
OutOfTheBit is an independent developer studio based in Wimbledon (London, UK) mixing passion for the classics with an eye for innovation. Its modern takes on football and racing arcade games, Super Arcade Football and Super Arcade Racing are on Steam and major consoles and Full Void is their latest endeavour.

The vision for OutOfTheBit is to be a hub for talented artists who will handcraft unique gaming experiences that combine a retro feeling with modern and innovative mechanics to tell compelling interactive stories.
